Subject: Inquiry about service
Body: Hi, I need more information about your premium package. Can you provide me with the details?

Subject: Complaint about delay
Body: I am very frustrated with the delay in receiving my order. Please let me know when I can expect it to arrive.

Subject: Request for document
Body: Could you send me the latest financial statements for my portfolio?

Subject: Feedback on website
Body: The new website looks great, but I encountered some bugs while using it. Please fix them for a smoother experience.

Subject: Urgent request for meeting
Body: I need an urgent meeting with a consultant to discuss my account. Please arrange it ASAP!
